author: .paulharris
content:
Here's a pretty big one I've been slow to identify, but its totally obvious now... 
GET `/eth/v1/validator/blocks/{slot}` (produce unsigned block) is going to need to probably have a v2.
Arguably the POST `/eth/v1/beacon/blocks` could be updated to handle altair blocks, but the GET is going to be returning a different structure and I'm not sure it'd be a good idea to return the new block structure through that...
It'd be great to gather some opinions on how we tackle this problem as a new endpoint for post and get on block creation is going to have far reaching implications <@!144468805697929216> <@!602753420033785856>

author: jgm
content: From  a pure API perspective, yes these should have a v2.  The v2 could be either be purely for Altair blocks, or for all blocks with some sort of genesis/Altair/... version identifier in the metadata (which would avoid the requirement for a v3/v4/... as further changes are made).
